channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA NVFlash, NVUFlash, GPUModeSwitch Tool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA NVFlash, NVUFlash, GPUModeSwitch Tool

item.title: CVE-2019-5688|2024-08-04T20:01:52.098Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20nvflash%2C%20nvuflash%2C%20gpumodeswitch%20tool
item.description: NVIDIA NVFlash, NVUFlash Tool prior to v5.588.0 and GPUModeSwitch Tool prior to 2019-11, NVIDIA kernel mode driver (nvflash.sys, nvflsh32.sys, and nvflsh64.sys) contains a vulnerability in which authenticated users with administrative privileges can gain access to device memory and registers of other devices not managed by NVIDIA, which may lead to escalation of privileges, information disclosure, or denial of service.
